title: Tazah Premium Dry Mallow Leaves 7oz Molokhia Leaves Egyptian Dried Mulukhiyah 200g Box
features: AUTHENTIC FLAVOR: TAZAH Premium Egyptian Mulukhiyah Leaves bring the true taste of Middle Eastern, North African, and East African cuisine to your kitchen.
NUTRIENT-RICH: Packed with vitamins A, C, and E, as well as calcium, iron, and dietary fiber for a healthful addition to your meals.
EASY PREPARATION: Simply soak the leaves in water for a few minutes, and then cook according to your preferred recipe.
VERSATILE USE: Perfect for traditional dishes like stews, soups, and salads, adding depth of flavor and nutrition to your culinary creations.
CAREFULLY SOURCED: Our mulukhiyah leaves come directly from Egypt, ensuring authenticity and quality in every box.
COMMON NAMES: Mulukhiyah is known by a variety of names in different regions, including molokhiya, mloukhiya, jute leaves, Jew's mallow, and nalta jute.
description: If you're a fan of Middle Eastern, North African, or East African cuisine, you'll love Tazah Premium Dry Mallow Leaves. Each 7oz box contains carefully dried mulukhiyah leaves that are sourced from Egypt, the birthplace of this tasty and nutritious herb.Mulukhiyah is rich in vitamins and minerals, including vitamins A, C, and E, calcium, and iron. It's also a great source of dietary fiber, which can aid in digestion and help you feel full for longer.Tazah Premium Dry Mallow Leaves are carefully selected and dried to preserve their flavor and nutritional value. They're easy to prepare and can be used in a variety of dishes, including stews, soups, and salads. Simply soak them in water for a few minutes, and then cook them according to your favorite recipe.Tazah Premium Dry Mallow Leaves are the perfect ingredient to add authentic flavor and nutrition to your meals.
